Entries.85926000/t 2100 2600/d Mon Wed Fri/z spr: winter_day_ambient/1000 1000/farmer 6 7 1 Din 8 7 3/speak Din "Come to bed, mesh'la?"/question fork0 "Go to bed?#No, stay up and go to bed later.#Yes, go to bed and end the day."/fork Winter00Bed/skippable/changeLocation Custom_Bed/ambientLight 255 255 200/positionOffset farmer 30 -5/positionOffset Din -30 -2/pause 100/viewport 7 7/pause 1000/speak Din "You're hands are icy, @.#$b#Let me warm them up.$l"/pause 1000/positionOffset farmer 8 0/pause 1000/positionOffset Din -8 0/pause 1400/animate farmer false false 1500 101/animate Din true false 1500 28/playSound slime/specificTemporarySprite heart 7 6/pause 2000/speak Din "Come here, cyar'ika.#$b#Let me hold you?"/pause 1000/positionOffset farmer 15 0/playSound rabbit/pause 400/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 1000/animate farmer true true 100 101/positionOffset farmer 10 5/animate Din true true 100 28/playSound tinyWhip/pause 1000/speak Din "Shall I talk until you fall asleep?$h"/pause 900/jump farmer 2/playSound dustMeep/pause 1500/speak Din "The snow was beautiful today. I think the kid ate about a pound of it though.$h#$b#Can't look away from him for a minute.$h"/pause 1000/emote farmer 24/pause 1000/textAboveHead Din "sleep, cyare"/pause 600/globalFade/viewport -100 -100/end newDay

Entries.85926004/t 2100 2600/d Tue Thu Sat Sun/z: nightTime/1000 1000/farmer 6 7 1 Din 7 7 3 Grogu 8 6 2/speak Din "Bedtime, @.$h"/question fork0 "Go to bed?#No, stay up and go to bed later.#Yes, go to bed and end the day."/fork Fall04Bed/skippable/changeLocation Custom_Bed/ambientLight 255 255 200/positionOffset farmer 0 -5/positionOffset Din -4 -2/animate Grogu true true 100 19/positionOffset Grogu -10 0/pause 100/viewport 7 7/pause 1000/emote Grogu 24/pause 1500/speak Din "The kid stole my pillow.#$b#Guess we have to share, riduur.$h"/pause 1000/positionOffset farmer 8 0/pause 1400/animate farmer false false 1500 101/animate Din true false 1500 28/playSound tinyWhip/specificTemporarySprite heart 7 6/pause 2000/speak Din "Hmmmm, you're still too far away."/pause 1000/playSound rabbit/animate farmer false true 100 101/positionOffset farmer 0 10/animate Din true true 100 28/pause 1500/speak Din "That's better.$h"/pause 900/jump farmer 1/playSound dustMeep/pause 1500/speak Din "What do you want for breakfast tomorrow?$h#$b#... @?"/pause 1000/emote farmer 24/pause 1500/textAboveHead Din "goodnight, cyare"/pause 600/globalFade/viewport -100 -100/end newDay

What's wrong?"/pause 500/playSound rabbit/pause 300/eyes 1 -3000/viewport 7 7/pause 1000/emote farmer 40/pause 1500/jump farmer 2/stopAnimation Din 28/animate Din true true 100 4/pause 1000/speak Din "I can hear you thinking.#$b#The farm is doing well, the kid is safe, you are well.#$b#Rest, love. Anything else can wait.$l"/pause 1000/playSound dustMeep/startJittering/pause 300/stopJittering/pause 1000/speak Din "Yes, and you have me.$l#$b#I won't let anything bad happen, cyare."/pause 1500/eyes 1 -7000/playSound dustMeep/pause 1000/stopAnimation Din 4/animate Din true true 100 28/pause 1500/textAboveHead Din "sleep now"/pause 1600/globalFade/viewport -100 -100/end newDay
